caption: emma_watson with short, styled hair featuring soft curls framing her face. She has a fair complexion with a hint of rosy blush on her cheeks, and her eyes are dark and expressive. A subtle yet elegant smile reveals a light sheen of gloss on her lips. She is wearing a strapless black dress that accentuates her shoulders and neckline. Around her neck, there is a delicate silver necklace with a heart-shaped key pendant, adding a touch of sparkle. The background is softly lit, showcasing softly blurred text that reads something related to "flower."
